Transcription for 1215491

Dawn shares her experience of sex education.
Thinking back when you were growing up in school or when you were younger,
did you ever get sex education or any support around relationships and things?
I wish I did. I wish I did, but no. No.
So how have you learned how to be in a relationship?
I just learned my own self sometimes and made mistakes. Big mistakes.
Sometimes.
